messages.messageBody:
The story below has been updated with another page
http://1happyturtle.com/parody2/parody3.htm
[this second page contains a modified version of the TMPD's
mascot...so unless you know with 100% accuracy that the TMPD would
send over their most hottest officers to arrest me for messing with
their beloved mascot please don't pass on this story to the "public").
*and* someone asked me for an explanation for the Shinsengumi-Japan's
license plates so I did explain the abbreviations right beneath the
photo of the cars
http://1happyturtle.com/parody2/parody2.htm
the last installment is almost done...

secretarytocapt3
working on Jo Odagiri's dialogue and Shosuke Tanihara's fatal weakness...

messages.subject: 2 Humor Pieces
messages.msgSnippet: Title: Close and Personal Interview with K.S. Author:secretarytocapt3 E-mail:secretarytocapt3(At)hotmail.com Source: Koichi Sato pics Archived on the website:
messages.messageBody:
Title: Close and Personal Interview with K.S.
Author:secretarytocapt3
E-mail:secretarytocapt3(At)hotmail.com
Source: Koichi Sato pics
Archived on the website: can't make this one public
General Rating: G
Warning: Stab at humor
Disclaimer: I used pics Koichi SAto scanned from a Japanese magazine
(thank you Tama+BArb)...so keep this humor piece to yourself...I don't
want to get sued (^_^)
Intro: Mr. Koichi Sato did a fantastic job portraying Saitou Hajime in
MIBUGISHIDEN...but can the award winning actor turn down this
*business proposition*?
http://1happyturtle.com/parody/parody.htm
-----------------------------------------------------------
Title: SHinsengumi-USA (vs) Shinsengumi-Japan
Author:secretarytocapt3
E-mail:secretarytocapt3(At)hotmail.com
Source: (Japan's Shinsengumi Fan world-cosplayers, clubs, parades)
Main character(s): Babs, M.B., Midori, Alexandra, Steph (all of whom
are my own creations, any resemblence to SHQ members is a coincidence)
Archived on the website: still incomplete
General Rating: G
Warning: Stab at humor
Disclaimer: I used pics of Japanese cosplayers but I was careful to
resize pics so that you can't really see their faces...I also made up
some merchandise as well
Intro: Shinsengumi fans have been known for their fanatical devotion.
What will happen if fans from the USA clash with their more skilled
counterparts in Japan?
http://1happyturtle.com/parody2/parody2.htm
Status: INCOMPLETE BUT I"LL FINISH IT SOON...STILL SEARCHING FOR THE
PERFECT PICS
